Nightlight:

Nightlight was hit several times by the bullets but still she disn't 
like quit, she took off and shot severl times against Destructor and 
Ender while she said "Niether is nice shot in the back... that means 
that you're a coward 'cause you're showing that you can't face an 
enemie..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        He takes the shots in the back including one to the back of 
his head.  
> "HEY!  That hurt."  He touches the whole in the back of his 
head.  "You shot 
> through me helmet.  That's just not nice."  He turns around to face 
> Nightlight.  "Was it you wenchy?  Eh?  Did you shoot me?  That 
wasn't very 
> nice."  He smiles at her.  Then he raises his gun and fires a few 
shots.  
> "Now you're probably wondering why I have a helmet.  Well, you 
see ... this 
> DNA I got isn't made for an oxygen atmosphere.  It thrives on 
methane.  "So 
> if I was to go around all unprotected it'd be mighty unpleasant for 
me."  He 
> fires two more shots at her.  "Not deadly mind you, I did make 
certain of 
> that, but unpleasant nonetheless."
